statements: SELECT * FROM research_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, university_name FROM research_projects;
SELECT project_name, status FROM research_projects WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT university_name, project_name FROM research_projects ORDER BY university_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, university_name FROM research_projects WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, university_name, start_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date <= '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE university_name LIKE '%University';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT university_name) AS total_universities, COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM research_projects WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM joint_research_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM joint_research_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, university_id FROM joint_research_projects WHERE university_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM joint_research_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, university_name FROM joint_research_projects JOIN universities ON joint_research_projects.university_id = universities.university_id;
SELECT * FROM joint_research_projects WHERE university_id = 1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM joint_research_projects WHERE end_date > '2021-07-01';
SELECT * FROM joint_research_projects WHERE university_id IN (2, 3) AND end_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, university_name FROM joint_research_projects JOIN universities ON joint_research_projects.university_id = universities.university_id;
SELECT project_name, country FROM joint_research_projects JOIN universities ON joint_research_projects.university_id = universities.university_id WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT project_id, project_name, university_name, start_date, end_date FROM ResearchProjects;
SELECT * FROM ProjectMembers WHERE member_type = 'Lead';
SELECT project_id, progress_status, progress_date FROM ProjectProgress WHERE progress_status = 'Complete';
SELECT project_id, progress_date, updated_by FROM ProjectProgress ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, university_name FROM ResearchProjects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, university_name FROM ResearchProjects
SELECT project_id, end_date FROM ResearchProjects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT member_name, member_type FROM ProjectMembers ORDER BY member_type DESC
SELECT project_id, progress_status, progress_date FROM ProjectProgress WHERE updated_by = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM ResearchProjects JOIN ProjectMembers ON ResearchProjects.project_id = ProjectMembers.project_id
SELECT * FROM research_projects;
SELECT project_name, university_name FROM research_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT publication_title, publication_id FROM publications WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT project_name FROM research_projects WHERE university_name = 'Stanford University';
SELECT * FROM researchers JOIN universities ON researchers.university_id = universities.university_id;
SELECT * FROM research_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC, project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, university_name, start_date FROM research_projects WHERE project_id > 5;

SELECT researcher_name, university_name, project_name FROM researchers JOIN universities ON researchers.university_id = universities.university_id JOIN research_projects ON researchers.project_id = research_projects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM research_projects JOIN universities ON research_projects.university_name = universities.university_name;
SELECT researcher_name, publication_title, publication_id FROM researchers JOIN publications ON researchers.researcher_id = publications.researcher_id WHERE publication_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM University;
SELECT university_name, location FROM University WHERE university_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM ResearchProject ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, role FROM ProjectMember WHERE project_id = 3 ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT collaboration_type, university_id1, university_id2 FROM Collaboration WHERE collaboration_id > 100 AND collaboration_id < 200;
SELECT * FROM University WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM ResearchProject WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, university_name, role FROM ProjectMember JOIN University ON ProjectMember.university_id = University.university_id WHERE University.university_name = 'Stanford';
SELECT collaboration_type, university_id1, university_id2 FROM Collaboration WHERE collaboration_type = 'Research';

SELECT project_name, update_date, update_details FROM ResearchProject JOIN ProgressUpdate ON ResearchProject.project_id = ProgressUpdate.project_id WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01';
